Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Hiding Spot

  1. What happens if someone has Brave and Stealth at the same time, like if I played Hiding Spot on Blitzwing while he was in tank mode, do they cancel out, does the newer stays take effect?
    They cancel each other out. An attacker is not able to fulfill both conditions, therefore the attacking player can choose a defender as normal.
  2. After seeing which of my characters gets stealth, can my opponent change which of their characters is attacking?
    No. Hiding Spot isnâ€™t revealed until after your opponent locks in their choice for attacker.
